item.title: Trump fires off full-throated endorsement well in advance of GOP primary in Georgia governor's race
item.description: President Donald Trump endorsed Georgia Lt. Gov. Burt Jones for governor well ahead of the GOP gubernatorial primary in the Peach State

item.title: Bernie Sanders brings 'Fighting Oligarchy Tour' to Trump strongholds across deep-red West Virginia
